an1.1:1.2: Ngarl ngan-ya kuttuck quadga-kartaga. E-jow gyne gorah nunn-o-luck Bridiyar-Kaartijen quadga be jin bar-dook Sāvatthi bura Jeta's Grove, Anāthapindika’s monastery. Ponto nunn-o-luck Bridiyar-Kaartijen yaller-wingaween kwabba winyarn-ang, “Kwabba-winyarn-ang!”
an1.1:1.3: “Mulgar-maaman,” bal-goon yulman-wangow. Nunn-o-luck Bridiyar-Kaartijen yaller-wingaween ne:
